subject: Collaboration Proposal: Review of Simsonn Hardware on Simracing Enthusiast Channel
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

My name is Jakub Świderski, and I run a YouTube channel called *Simracing
Enthusiast Jakub Świderski*, dedicated entirely to simracing hardware
reviews and tutorials.

I have been following your brand's growth and have noticed the positive
feedback regarding your equipment within the simracing community. I believe
your products offer a fantastic price-to-performance ratio that my audience
is specifically looking for.

I am writing to inquire if you would be interested in a collaboration. I
would love to test and review your* Simsonn Pedals and HS Pro Shifter* on
my channel. My viewers are asking me constantly about them.

*Here is what I can offer:*

   -

   *Detailed Video Review:* A comprehensive unboxing and honest performance
   review.
   -

   *Targeted Audience:* My viewers are dedicated simracing enthusiasts
   actively looking for hardware upgrades.
   -

   *Promotion:* I will include links to your store in the video description
   and pinned comments.

You can check out my channel and previous reviews here:*
https://www.youtube.com/@SimRacingEnthusiastJakub
<https://www.youtube.com/@SimRacingEnthusiastJakub>*

Please let me know if you are open to sending a review unit. I am happy to
discuss any specific details or requirements you might have.

Best regards,

Jakub Świderski
